name: Sobremesa - Solita - Cervantes Fino
additionalNotes:
In what may be one of the biggest comebacks to the premium cigar industry, Steve Saka has returned- and not with a whimper, but a bang! Â Saka, former President and CEO of Drew Estate has set the cigar world on fire with his re-inaugural debut- the Sobremesa. Capturing the spirit and essence of everything 
These finished vitolas are laid to rest in aromatic cedar bins until their medium to full flavors of earth, sweet spice, leather and coffee come shining through with every savory puff.
